package.name: better-turkish
package.author: Inan Hira
package.description: A package that provides (opinionatedly) intuitive triggers for the accented letters in the Turkish alphabet.
package.title: Better Turkish accents

manifest.name: better-turkish
manifest.title: Better Turkish accents
manifest.description: A package that provides (opinionatedly) intuitive triggers for the accented letters in the Turkish alphabet.
manifest.author: Inan Hira

packageRepo.readme:
# better-turkish

This is a package provides all the accented letters, including the ones that
are missing from the other Turkish language packages on the Hub.

It provides triggers that are less likely to collide with certain use cases,
such as common programming language syntaxes, other Espanso package triggers,
or hyphenated words.

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  # Cedillas
  - trigger: ",,C"
    replace: "Ç"
  - trigger: ",,c"
    replace: "ç"
  - trigger: ",,S"
    replace: "Ş"
  - trigger: ",,s"
    replace: "ş"

  # Umlauts
  - trigger: "..O"
    replace: "Ö"
  - trigger: "..o"
    replace: "ö"
  - trigger: "..U"
    replace: "Ü"
  - trigger: "..u"
    replace: "ü"

  # Breves
  - trigger: "--G"
    replace: "Ğ"
  - trigger: "--g"
    replace: "ğ"

  # Dotless/Dotted
  - trigger: "!!i"
    replace: "ı"
  - trigger: "..I"
    replace: "İ"

  # Circumflex
  - trigger: "^A"
    replace: "Â"
  - trigger: "^a"
    replace: "â"
  - trigger: "^I"
    replace: "Î"
  - trigger: "^i"
    replace: "î"
  - trigger: "^U"
    replace: "Û"
  - trigger: "^u"
    replace: "û"
